last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8
last_episode_to_air.overview: Eve's surgical career hangs in the balance and she is forced to tell the truth or face the consequences.

name: The Surgeon
overview:
The Surgeon was an Australian primetime television Medical drama. It screened at 9:30pm on Thursdays on Network Ten and in Ireland early morning on RTÃ‰ One. The show was based at a fictional hospital named Sydney General Hospital.

The first season consisted of 8 half-hour episodes. The show was not renewed for a second season due to a number of poor reviews and lack of sufficient ratings.
